com.foreach.across.modules.entity.views.settings

Class FormEntityViewSettings

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.foreach.across.modules.entity.views.settings.FormEntityViewSettings
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Consumer<EntityViewFactoryBuilder>

    public class FormEntityViewSettings
extends Object
implements Consumer<EntityViewFactoryBuilder>
    Basic consumer that allows configuration of form related options. Can set some basic form properties and re-configure a form view for a single extension form.

    It supports configuration of the following processors:

    • SingleEntityFormViewProcessor
    Since:
    3.0.0
    Author:
    Arne Vandamme
